sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from "react" import * as XLSX from "xlsx" const SupplierDetail = () => { const [supplierDetails, setSupplierDetails] = useState([]) const [supplierBillFile, setSupplierBillFile] = useState(null) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ poNumber: "", poBalanceQty: "", inwardNo: "", vehicleNo: "", dateTime: "", supplierName: "", material: "", uom: "", receivedQty: "", receivedBy: "", supplierBillQty: "", poRate: "", supplierBillRate: "", receivedAmount: "", difference: "", status: "Pending", }) const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}) // Mock data for testing const mockSupplierDetails = [ { id: 1, sno: 1, poNumber: "PO202312001", poBalanceQty: "50.00", inwardNo: "INW20231201001", vehicleNo: "MH12AB1234", dateTime: "2023-12-01T09:30", supplierName: "ABC Construction Materials", material: "Portland Cement", uom: "Tons", receivedQty: "48.50", receivedBy: "John Doe", supplierBillQty: "48.50", poRate: "5000.00", supplierBillRate: "5100.00", receivedAmount: "247350.00", supplierBillFile: null, difference: "-100.00", status: "Pending", createdAt: "2023-12-01T09:30:00.000Z", }, { id: 2, sno: 2, poNumber: "PO202312002", poBalanceQty: "75.00", inwardNo: "INW20231202001", vehicleNo: "KA05CD5678", dateTime: "2023-12-02T14:15", supplierName: "XYZ Steel Corporation", material: "Steel Rods", uom: "Tons", receivedQty: "72.00", receivedBy: "Jane Smith", supplierBillQty: "72.00", poRate: "45000.00", supplierBillRate: "44500.00", receivedAmount: "3204000.00", supplierBillFile: null, difference: "500.00", status: "Approved", createdAt: "2023-12-02T14:15:00.000Z", }, { id: 3, sno: 3, poNumber: "PO202312003", poBalanceQty: "100.00", inwardNo: "INW20231203001", vehicleNo: "TN09EF9012", dateTime: "2023-12-03T11:45", supplierName: "PQR Aggregates Ltd", material: "Sand", uom: "Cubic Meters", receivedQty: "95.00", receivedBy: "Mike Johnson", supplierBillQty: "95.00", poRate: "800.00", supplierBillRate: "850.00", receivedAmount: "80750.00", supplierBillFile: null, difference: "-50.00", status: "Rejected", createdAt: "2023-12-03T11:45:00.000Z", }, { id: 4, sno: 4, poNumber: "PO202312004", poBalanceQty: "200.00", inwardNo: "INW20231204001", vehicleNo: "AP12GH3456", dateTime: "2023-12-04T16:20", supplierName: "LMN Brick Works", material: "Red Bricks", uom: "Thousands", receivedQty: "190.00", receivedBy: "Sarah Wilson", supplierBillQty: "190.00", poRate: "4500.00", supplierBillRate: "4500.00", receivedAmount: "855000.00", supplierBillFile: null, difference: "0.00", status: "Pending", createdAt: "2023-12-04T16:20:00.000Z", }, { id: 5, sno: 5, poNumber: "PO202312005", poBalanceQty: "30.00", inwardNo: "INW20231205001", vehicleNo: "DL08IJ7890", dateTime: "2023-12-05T08:30", supplierName: "RST Timber Supplies", material: "Teak Wood", uom: "Cubic Feet", receivedQty: "28.50", receivedBy: "David Brown", supplierBillQty: "28.50", poRate: "12000.00", supplierBillRate: "11800.00", receivedAmount: "336300.00", supplierBillFile: null, difference: "200.00", status: "Approved", createdAt: "2023-12-05T08:30:00.000Z", }, ] useEffect(() => { const savedDetails = localStorage.getItem("supplierDetails") if (savedDetails) { setSupplierDetails(JSON.parse(savedDetails)) } else { // Initialize with mock data if no saved data setSupplierDetails(mockSupplierDetails) localStorage.setItem("supplierDetails", JSON.stringify(mockSupplierDetails)) } // Set current date and time const now = new Date() setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, dateTime: now.toISOString().slice(0, 16), })) }, []) const saveSupplierDetails = (details) => { localStorage.setItem("supplierDetails", JSON.stringify(details)) setSupplierDetails(details) } const handleSupplierBillUpload = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] if (file && (file.type === "application/pdf" || file.type.startsWith("image/"))) { setSupplierBillFile(file) } else { alert("Please upload a PDF or image file only") } } const handleFileUpload = (id) => { const input = document.createElement("input") input.type = "file" input.accept = ".pdf,.jpg,.jpeg,.png,.gif" input.onchange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] if (file && (file.type === "application/pdf" || file.type.startsWith("image/"))) { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.map((detail) => detail.id === id ? { ...detail, supplierBillFile: file.name, updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() } : detail, ) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) alert(`File "${file.name}" uploaded successfully!`) } else { alert("Please upload a PDF or image file only") } } input.click() } const calculateAmount = useCallback(() => { const qty = Number.parseFloat(formData.supplierBillQty) || 0 const rate = Number.parseFloat(formData.supplierBillRate) || 0 return (qty * rate).toFixed(2) }, [formData.supplierBillQty, formData.supplierBillRate]) const calculateDifference = useCallback(() => { const poRate = Number.parseFloat(formData.poRate) || 0 const supplierRate = Number.parseFloat(formData.supplierBillRate) || 0 return (poRate - supplierRate).toFixed(2) }, [formData.poRate, formData.supplierBillRate]) useEffect(() => { const amount = calculateAmount() const difference = calculateDifference() setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, amount: amount, difference: difference, })) }, [calculateAmount, calculateDifference]) const validateForm = () => { const newErrors = {} if (!formData.poNumber.trim()) newErrors.poNumber = "PO Number is required" if (!formData.poBalanceQty.trim()) newErrors.poBalanceQty = "PO Balance Qty is required" if (!formData.poRate.trim()) newErrors.poRate = "PO Rate is required" if (!formData.inwardNo.trim()) newErrors.inwardNo = "Inward No is required" if (!formData.vehicleNo.trim()) newErrors.vehicleNo = "Vehicle No is required" if (!formData.dateTime) newErrors.dateTime = "Date & Time is required" if (!formData.supplierName.trim()) newErrors.supplierName = "Supplier Name is required" if (!formData.material.trim()) newErrors.material = "Material is required" if (!formData.uom.trim()) newErrors.uom = "UOM is required" if (!formData.receivedQty.trim()) newErrors.receivedQty = "Received Qty is required" if (!formData.receivedBy.trim()) newErrors.receivedBy = "Received By is required" if (!formData.supplierBillQty.trim()) newErrors.supplierBillQty = "Supplier Bill Qty is required" if (!formData.supplierBillRate.trim()) newErrors.supplierBillRate = "Supplier Bill Rate is required" if (!formData.receivedAmount.trim()) newErrors.receivedAmount = "Received Amount is required" return newErrors } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const formErrors = validateForm() if (Object.keys(formErrors).length > 0) { setErrors(formErrors) return } const newDetail = { ...formData, id: Date.now(), sno: supplierDetails.length + 1, supplierBillFile: supplierBillFile ? supplierBillFile.name : null, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), } const updatedDetails = [...supplierDetails, newDetail] saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) resetForm() } const resetForm = () => { const now = new Date() setFormData({ poNumber: "", poBalanceQty: "", inwardNo: "", vehicleNo: "", dateTime: now.toISOString().slice(0, 16), supplierName: "", material: "", uom: "", receivedQty: "", receivedBy: "", supplierBillQty: "", poRate: "", supplierBillRate: "", receivedAmount: "", difference: "", status: "Pending", }) setErrors({}) setSupplierBillFile(null) } const handleApproval = (id, action) => { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.map((detail) => detail.id === id ? { ...detail, status: action, updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() } : detail, ) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) } const handleDelete = (id) => { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this supplier detail?")) { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.filter((detail) => detail.id !== id) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) } } const handleView = (detail) => { alert(` Supplier Detail Information: PO Number: ${detail.poNumber} Supplier: ${detail.supplierName} Material: ${detail.material} Quantity: ${detail.supplierBillQty} ${detail.uom} Rate: ₹${detail.supplierBillRate} Amount: ₹${detail.amount} Received By: ${detail.receivedBy} Status: ${detail.status} `) } const loadSuppliersFromExcel = () => { const input = document.createElement("input") input.type = "file" input.accept = ".xlsx,.xls" input.onchange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] if (!file) { alert("⚠️ No file selected.") return } const reader = new FileReader() reader.onload = (event) => { try { const data = new Uint8Array(event.target.result) const workbook = XLSX.read(data, { type: "array" }) const sheetName = workbook.SheetNames[0] const worksheet = workbook.Sheets[sheetName] const jsonData = XLSX.utils.sheet_to_json(worksheet) if (jsonData.length === 0) { alert("❌ The selected Excel file is empty.") return } const parsedData = [] jsonData.forEach((row, index) => { if (row.poNumber) { const record = { id: row.id || Date.now() + index, sno: row.sno || index + 1, poNumber: row.poNumber || "", poBalanceQty: row.poBalanceQty || "", poRate: row.poRate || "", inwardNo: row.inwardNo || "", vehicleNo: row.vehicleNo || "", dateTime: row.dateTime ? new Date(row.dateTime).toISOString().slice(0, 16) : new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16), supplierName: row.supplierName || "", material: row.material || "", uom: row.uom || "", receivedQty: row.receivedQty || "", receivedBy: row.receivedBy || "", supplierBillFile: row.pdfFile || null, supplierBillQty: row.supplierBillQty || "", supplierBillRate: row.supplierBillRate || "", receivedAmount: row.receivedAmount || "", amount: row.amount || "", difference: row.difference || "", status: row.status || "Pending", createdAt: row.createdAt ? new Date(row.createdAt).toISOString() : new Date().toISOString(), updatedAt: row.updatedAt ? new Date(row.updatedAt).toISOString() : null, } parsedData.push(record) } }) if (parsedData.length > 0) { setSupplierDetails(parsedData) localStorage.setItem("supplierDetails", JSON.stringify(parsedData)) alert(`✅ Successfully loaded ${parsedData.length} supplier records!`) } else { alert("⚠️ No valid supplier records found in the selected file.") } } catch (error) { console.error("Excel parsing error:", error) alert("❌ Error reading the selected Excel file.") } } reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file) } input.click() } const exportToExcel = () => { const worksheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(supplierDetails) const workbook = XLSX.utils.book_new() XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, worksheet, "Supplier Details") XLSX.writeFile(workbook, "supplier_details.xlsx") } return (
📄

) } export default SupplierDetail
